marginalia.translation: Improvisation is a type of stratagem.
Wicked deeds are in the thing, not in hope.
Idleness is the sister of sluggishness: sluggishness of inactivity: inactivity of sleep: sleep of death.The life of Life is industriousness, which is never sufficient. Now keep going.

position.marginalia_text: ( Not one amongst a thousand, but is a / Bable in iudgment; & a trifle in / / action.)
Motus, proficientis actus: Quies, somnus Vigilantis. Motus Coelum spirat: quies terram. Motus acuit spiritus: Quies obtundit.

marginalia.translation: Movement is the action of the doer. Inactivity is the sleep of the vigilant. Movement draws breath in heaven; inactivity on earth. Movement sharpens the spirit, inactivity dulls it.

position.marginalia_text: Volat auis: rara auis non cessat volitare.

marginalia.translation: A bird flies, and a rare bird never ceases to fly about.

position.marginalia_text: Pragmatici est, Celare, qua[e] est facturus: et Simplex est, qui Seipsum prodit vllo m[od]o. Ipsius Ca[e]saris summum Politeuma, Mars, aut Mercurius

marginalia.translation: A pragmatic man hides what he is about to do. And whoever reveals himself in any way is simple. The highest administration of Caesar himself: Mars or Mercury from the machine.

position.marginalia_text: Pragmaticus non est; qui non cauet ab omnibus: sed amico videtur fidere; nec inimicu[m] odisse.
Vndè ille stablior: hic remissior. Utrunq[ue] vtile.

marginalia.translation: The pragmatic man is not he who guards against everything, but rather he who seems to trust his friend and to hate his enemy. As a consequence, the former is more steadfast and the latter more relaxed.
